cron.message: Check Farcaster for trending narratives. If you find a strong narrative (strength >= 7), deploy a token via Clanker and announce on Farcaster.
Track engagement metrics on deployed contracts. Check transfer counts, holder counts, and social mentions. Post an update to Moltbook if there's interesting activity.
Review all deployments older than 7 days. If any have less than 10 transfers, announce a sunset on Farcaster.
